devdoc.author: Lazarus (Refactored for EIP-712)
devdoc.details: Inherits from EIP712 and Nonces to support signature-based authorization. The relayer (msg.sender) submits a user's signature to authorize the transfer.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

InvalidAccountNonce(address,uint256).details: The nonce used for an `account` is not the expected current nonce.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

EIP712DomainChanged().details: MAY be emitted to signal that the domain could have changed.

eip712Domain().details: returns the fields and values that describe the domain separator used by this contract for EIP-712 signature.

nonces(address).details: Allows off-chain services to query the nonce for signature generation.

params.owner: The address to query the nonce for.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendPaymentMeta(address,address,uint256,.details: The relayer (msg.sender) submits the user's signature (v, r, s) to authorize a transfer *from* the user's wallet. The user ('from') MUST have approved this contract to spend their USDT.

params.amount: The net amount of USDT the recipient should receive.
params.deadline: The timestamp after which the signature is invalid.
params.from: The user's address authorizing the transfer.
params.r: The r value of the signature.
params.s: The s value of the signature.
params.v: The recovery id of the signature.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: AutomataUsdt

nonces(address).notice: Returns the current nonce for an address.

sendPaymentMeta(address,address,uint256,.notice: Processes a USDT payment via a meta-transaction.

withdrawAVAX().notice: Allows the owner to withdraw any native AVAX accidentally sent to this contract.

withdrawTokens(address).notice: Allows the owner to rescue any ERC20 tokens accidentally sent to this contract's address (e.g., if a user sends tokens *to* the contract instead of approving it).

userdoc.notice: A secure, generic, gasless USDT payment contract for the Automata platform.
